title: Modernization of the Central Securities Depository
description: The CSD modernization aimed to enhance efficiency and security while supporting the Colombian market's operation. Its benefits included improving user experience, reducing operational risks, and optimizing response time, aligned with international standards and best practices.
altImage: Screenshot of the Central Securities Depository (CSD) Software
